div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 713 Sofia (Ovča kupel), Bulgaria, 1941- 1950 Burial: c. 400 B.C. (T) Contents: 100+ AR Thasos: st. (some with Α, Θ, Φ or dolphin) Disposition: private coll., Frankfurt 31 Gerasimov, BIAB 15 (1946), pp. 237, 242; 17 (1950), p. 318; 18 (1952), p. 403
